html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10232024-09-20ISED
ActWeights and Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Weights and Measures Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS in order to exempt timber dimension measuring devices (TDMD) from the following provisions of the Weights and Measures Regulations; (1) subsection 18(1) and section 21, which relate to the marking of devices; (2) section 32 which relates to the sealing of devices; and (3) part V of the regulations, which set out specifications relating to devices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0183 Publication Date: 2024-10-09
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS in order to exempt timber dimension measuring devices (TDMD) from the following provisions of the Weights and Measures Regulations; (1) subsection 18(1) and section 21, which relate to the marking of devices; (2) section 32 which relates to the sealing of devices; and (3) part V of the regulations, which set out specifications relating to devices.
